segments.text: Today more and more families have personal computers . People have wider range of choice to communicate with the outside world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . With the establishment of Internet and a lot of web companies , people are getting more and more dependent on the web .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One of the common uses of PC is that people can buy goods through it without going out to the physical stores .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me how it is done ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If a customer is interested in some certain goods , he can ask the web company to have the specimen of the goods shown on the color screen , and then the customer can place an order online to the sales company . And then the goods you want will be delivered to your home . The service is perfect and the delivery is free of charge .
segments.speaker: S1
